name: Fluppy
description:
A stupid game that I have made in one week in unity engine. The gameplay is hard very hard. You have to move left and right with horizontal input keys and stay on a unbalanced tile and watchout from spikes and collect stars. I know this game can be made in only 2 days but I develope it by self learning, this is my first game on itch.io, more will come in future, so stay tuned and follow me for updates, thanks.

Malik Aaliyan
